content:
[Apologies for cross-postings]

The University of Santiago de Compostela is looking for researchers on Computational Linguistics, Natural Language Processing, Artificial Intelligence, and related fields to join the Nós Project, aimed at building Artificial Intelligence resources and tools for Galician.
This call includes 3 postdoctoral (research associate) and 2 junior (research assistant) positions, for backgrounds in both NLP and Linguistics, all of them for a 3-year term.

  • Applications and more info:
    http://imaisd.usc.es/guiaconvocatorias.asp?i=en&s=-2-26-128-129&id=4719&t=9&st=0
    http://imaisd.usc.es/ftp/oit/documentos/5215_gl.pdf
    https://www.usc.gal/en/life

(Open Call 7/2021. Positions Refs.: 2021/C6M1 to 2021/C6M5)

* Deadline: July 26, 2021, CEST
* Estimated start date: September 1st, 2021.

Alberto J. Bugarín Diz
Research Centre on Intelligent Technologies (CiTIUS)
Universidade de Santiago de Compostela
sender_full_name: Alberto Bugarín (CiTIUS - University of Santiago de Compostela, ES)
